version_description:
- NEW! Cozi widgets are now available for iOS 10 users, making it faster than ever to view today's upcoming appointments. Add Cozi as a widget to the Today section of your device’s Notification Center, or simply use Force Touch on the Cozi app icon to see your next two calendar events.

- Several additional updates have been made to improve the performance of Cozi.

Thanks for using Cozi! To make our app better for you, we’ve added a new feature and made a few performance improvements.

- You can now receive Daily Agenda emails that list your family’s upcoming appointments and events. In Settings, choose to receive daily email notifications for each household member.
- Cozi Widgets are now available for iOS 10, making it faster than ever to view today’s upcoming appointments. In this update we’ve improved how appointments are shown in the Widget.
- We’ve fixed an issue that interfered with viewing recipes.
- We’ve made performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

This update fixes issues that occurred when adding new list items, checking off list items, and adding ingredients to a recipe.

Also new:

- You can now receive Daily Agenda emails that list your family’s upcoming appointments and events. In Settings, choose to receive daily email notifications for each household member.

- Cozi Widgets are now available for iOS 10, making it faster than ever to view today’s upcoming appointments. In this update we’ve improved how appointments are shown in the widget.

Thanks for using Cozi! With this update, we’ve improved the New Event screen so it’s faster to add and edit appointments. The layout of the screen will also be more familiar to iOS users.
We’ve also made some performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

Thanks for using Cozi! We listened to your feedback and brought back a month view date picker to our New Event screen, making it easier to add and edit appointments on your family's calendar.

Also with this update, Cozi no longer supports the Cozi Apple Watch app, and unfortunately the Watch app is no longer available in the App Store. This was a tough decision, and we apologize to families who have relied on the app. If you currently use the Watch app, you're likely to experience issues.

In this update we've also fixed login issues for families with a region setting outside of North America, and made performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

As always, thank you for using Cozi. If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/support.

In this update we've made minor bug fixes.

As always, thank you for using Cozi. If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/support.

In this update we've made minor bug fixes.

As always, thank you for using Cozi. If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/support.

In this update we fixed issues that were reported with lists, and added support for Split View and Slide Over on iPad.

As always, thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions or feedback, contact us at cozi.com/contact-us/.

Hello, Cozi Families!

To help you quickly find future and past appointments, we’ve added a new feature to Cozi Gold: Calendar Search.

With Calendar Search, you can zoom in on the past, present, and future to help you remember where you’ve been and what you have to do. Find out how often you usually wait between haircuts, see when your car is due for service, or quickly check when your dog last went to the vet.

This update also includes performance improvements which fix slowness in some accounts, as well as minor bug fixes.

If you have any questions, problems or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/contact-us so that we can help you directly. Thanks for using Cozi!

Hello Cozi Families,
With Cozi’s latest app release, it’s now easier than ever to stay up to date with changes to your family’s calendar. Starting this month, Cozi Gold subscribers will now receive Calendar Change Notifications by device notifications for anyone in their family who has the app installed and device notifications enabled. Also with this update we’ve:
• Fixed an issue with the meal planner date picker
• Fixed an issue with the appointment date picker that occurred in some locales
• Additional performance improvements and minor bug fixes
If you have any questions, problems or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/contact-us so that we can help you directly. Thanks for using Cozi!

Hello Cozi Families,
With Cozi’s latest app release, it’s now easier than ever to stay up to date with changes to your family’s calendar. With this update, Cozi Gold subscribers will now receive Calendar Change Notifications by device notification for anyone in the family with the app installed and device notifications enabled. Also with this update we’ve:
• Fixed an issue with the meal planner date picker
• Fixed an issue with the appointment date picker that could occur in some locales
• Fixed an issue with device notification sounds
• Additional performance improvements and minor bug fixes
If you have any questions, problems or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/contact-us so that we can help you directly. Thanks for using Cozi!

Hello Cozi Families,
With Cozi’s latest app release, it’s now easier than ever to stay up to date with changes to your family’s calendar. With this update, Cozi Gold subscribers will now receive Calendar Change Notifications by device notification for anyone in the family with the app installed and device notifications enabled. Also with this update we’ve:
• Fixed an issue with the meal planner date picker
• Fixed an issue with the appointment date picker that could occur in some locales
• Fixed an issue with device notification sounds
• Fixed an issue where the app unexpectedly closed after creating an appointment offline
• Additional performance improvements and minor bug fixes
If you have any questions, problems or feedback, please contact us at cozi.com/contact-us so that we can help you directly. Thanks for using Cozi!

Hello Cozi Families! In this update we’ve refreshed Family Settings, enabled recipe sharing, added today’s date to the calendar icon, and more:

• Check out the new Family Settings screen: you'll see a larger version of your beautiful family photo, and you can tap on individual family members to set color codes, email addresses, and agenda email delivery.
• Also available in Family Settings: instructions for integrating other calendars with Cozi and the ability to choose a new theme for your device (mobile app themes are a Gold feature).
• The calendar icon in the bottom menu now shows you today’s date! And remember, if you’ve scrolled to another date on the calendar, you can always tap on the calendar icon to return to today.
• In your Recipe Box, you can now easily share recipes via email, text, and more.
• Plus many other performance improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for using Cozi, and if you have any questions, problems or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

We fixed an issue introduced with the last update which caused the app to crash. Also new:

• Check out the new Family Settings screen: you'll see a larger version of your beautiful family photo, and you can tap on individual family members to set color codes, email addresses, and agenda email delivery.
• Also available in Family Settings: instructions for integrating other calendars with Cozi and the ability to choose a new theme for your device (mobile app themes are a Gold feature).
• The calendar icon in the bottom menu now shows you today’s date! And remember, if you’ve scrolled to another date on the calendar, you can always tap on the calendar icon to return to today.
• In your Recipe Box, you can now easily share recipes via email, text, and more.
• Plus many other performance improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for using Cozi, and if you have any questions, problems or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi Families!

In this update, we've made some improvements to Cozi so it works nicely with iOS 11.

As always, thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi Families!

In this update, we’ve made some improvements to Cozi so it works nicely with iOS 11, and have fixed a performance issue introduced with the last release.

As always, thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi Families!

• With this update, you can now choose how you receive event reminders and calendar change notifications. Go to Family Settings and tap on a family member to set these communications to Device Notification and/or Email.
• We also fixed an issue that interfered with reminders for some families.

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi Families!

• With this update, you can now choose how you receive event reminders and calendar change notifications. Go to Family Settings and tap on a family member to set these communications to Device Notification and/or Email.

• We fixed an issue that interfered with reminders for some families.

• We also fixed an issue that interfered with adding and sharing recipes.

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi families! This update has two big new features to help keep everyone informed about the schedule:

- Cozi reminders and notifications now have a custom sound! Make sure everyone has notifications and sounds enabled in iOS Settings.
- Cozi will now send a notification to others in the family when new events are added.
- Plus, you can now add and manage your holiday and Internet calendars from the app!
- Additional bug fixes

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi families. This update has a few bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi families. With this update, we've made a few fixes and performance improvements including:

- We fixed an issue with adding ingredients to recipes
- We fixed an issue that some users were experiencing when removing reminders from events
- We improved the "View past events" feature on the Calendar screen so that more recent appointments are in view initially

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Hello Cozi families. With this update, we've fixed a few issues, including one that occurred when adding list items and one involving repeating events.

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Thank you for using Cozi and if you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Thank you for using Cozi! This update includes many enhancements and bug fixes, including:

- A new 18-hour reminder for calendar events
- Recurring events now appear properly on the Today Widget
- General usability improvements

If you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us anytime at www.cozi.com/contact-us so we can help you directly.

Thank you for using Cozi! This update fixes an error that some users were incorrectly receiving about their Cozi Gold subscriptions. Plus, the main calendar view is now labeled "Agenda" (formerly labeled "Week").

If you have any questions, problems, or feedback, please contact us anytime at help@cozi.com so we can help you directly.
